title: Header breadcrumb - page
custom_preconds: GIVEN that breadcrumb appears in the header
custom_steps: WHEN user is on the Home page, then the page section of the breadcrumb reads Home
custom_expected:
AND page section of the breadcrumb changes with navigation to Departments, Apps, Directory, Calendar, Events, Spaces

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19816)

title: Nav is present
custom_preconds: GIVEN that main page has loaded
custom_expected:
THEN nav appears on the left side of the screen
AND nav is red 
AND elements are white

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19835)

title: Nav function: redirects
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps anywhere in an element's box
custom_expected:
THEN page redirects to the correct page in the site, as follows:

Home -> Main Page
Departments -> Global Departments page
Apps -> Apps page
Directory -> Global Directory page
Calendar -> Calendar page
Events -> Events page
Spaces -> Spaces page

AND all elements in the nav have remained in alignment

title: Nav function: open stays open
custom_preconds: GIVEN that nav is expanded, showing icons and labels
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on an icon/label
AND page redirects
custom_expected: THEN nav stays expanded on the new page.

title: OBSOLETE Nav function: carat
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport above 991px
AND nav has appeared
AND carat has appeared, pointing into the nav
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on any nav icon/label
custom_expected:
THEN the carat moves to the correct icon/label that the user has navigated to

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19204)

title: OBSOLETE Nav function: closed stays closed
custom_preconds: GIVEN that nav is minimized, showing only icons
custom_steps:
WHEN user clicks or taps on an icon
AND page redirects to a new page
custom_expected: THEN nav stays minimized on the new page.

title: Nav open, above 767px - appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport above 767px
AND nav has appeared
AND nav is closed, showing only icons
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the nav button
custom_expected:
THEN nav expands 
AND nav looks like the photo below

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19819)

title: Nav closed, above 767px - appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport above 767px
AND nav has appeared
AND the nav has expanded
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks or taps on the nav button
custom_expected:
THEN the nav collapses
AND the nav looks like the photo below

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19820)

title: Nav open, at or below 767px - appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 767px
AND nav is open
custom_expected:
THEN nav looks like the photo below

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19821)

title: Nav closed, at or below 767px - appearance
custom_preconds:
GIVEN that user is in a viewport at or below 767px
AND nav is closed
custom_expected:
THEN just the button appears, and it looks like the photo below

![](index.php?/attachments/get/19822)

title: Test responsiveness
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is on a desktop platform
custom_steps:
WHEN user decreases the viewport
AND WHEN user expands the viewport
custom_expected:
THEN all elements continue to appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other in any viewport
AND images stay proportionate (not stretched or squished)
AND all elements function as expected.

Note: In Windows IE and Edge, Chatter images will be stretched.

title: Test mobile
custom_preconds: GIVEN that user is using a mobile device
custom_expected:
THEN all elements appear on the page
AND no elements overlap any other
AND all elements function as expected
